record.id: field.name="work.fld.desc" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: work.fld.desc
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: For example, if the Field reason has three valid values (mt, nw, fx), some users may not understand the meaning of these values. By making the description maintenance, new, and fix respectively, the selection process is easier and more meaningful for the user.

detail.detail: The Value Summary list reflects the value of each Desc field. If you do not enter a description, the value in the Value Summary list is the actual Value.
Note: The Validation Routine validates against the field values of the definition, not those of the value's description.
